"Allow me to make this a little easier." He hooks 4 magnetic grav-
lifts to each crate, activates them and they rise about an inch from 
the deck of the loading bay. 

"Show me where you'd like these" Phobia smiles maniacally as he 
circles around to push a crate.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster/Shredder::
> 
> Kluster walks into the landing bay, seeing Phobia already there. He 
looks 
> from Phobia's ship to Phobia. He then looks at the crates.
> 
> "We'll take them to cargo hold one," he says, pointing to a 
door, "Right 
> behind that door. Hysteria will check them over there."
> 
> Kluster walks over to one of the crates, ready to lift it along 
with Phobia.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Shredder raises an eyebrow as Magmatron adresses what was seemingly 
a wall as 
> 'Phobia'. He frowns. Was his leader insane? Maybe the presence of 
Unicron had 
> driven him to that condition....
> 
> He looks at Magmatron when the bot aproaches him again. "So what 
are we doing 
> now?"
